job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Blue Rose is currently seeking someone with the skills to help us improve the public-facing systems of a federal client. Specifically, you will implement a new chatbot product to enhance customer experience and reduce operational costs by using conversational AI technology - natural language processing (NLP) and other cognitive APIs. You will develop, train, and evaluate natural language processing (NLP) models for the deployed Conversational AI Platform.<br><br>The successful candidate will:<br><ul><li>use statistical analysis and programming to analyze and interpret language datasets </li><li>provide expertise in AI services, including Natural Language Processing, and ML architecture</li><li>analyze training and test data to help fine tune semantic models to improve overall accuracy and performance</li><li>develop supervised and unsupervised learning models to provide actionable insights for business requirements.<br></li></ul><strong>Requirements:<br></strong><ul><li>Must be U.S. Citizen</li><li>Experienced in Machine Learning concepts and algorithms, Python (3.X), Scikit-Learn, Natural Language Tool Kit, and SQL (Relational or NoSQL)</li><li>Preferred experience with backend web development (Java, Mongo/DynamoDB, NodeJS) and RESTful Architecture<br></li></ul>The salary for this position is $110,000 - $130,000 annually.<br><br>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>QNXetDeDtQ
